contents.title: Content Wind
contents.description: A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website, based on Nuxt Content, TailwindCSS and Iconify ✨

children.value: A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website, based on
Create Vue components and use them in Markdown
Deploy on any Node or Static hosting: GH Pages, Vercel, Netlify, Heroku, etc.
Open a terminal and run the following command:
Follow the instructions in the terminal and you are ready to go 🚀
This template has some built-in features to make it as easy as possible to create a content-driven website.
Create your Markdown pages in the

children.value: This first paragraph will be treated as the page meta description.
You can overwrite meta tags by using front-matter:

props.code:

title: 'Custom title'
description: 'Custom meta description'
image: 'Custom image injected as `og:image`'
---

html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}
